rationale: No mention of levothyroxine 88 mcg, atorvastatin 20 mg, dosing schedule, or adherence.
Note lacks any statement about how the patient feels after the dose increase or absence of symptoms.
Includes counseling to monitor for palpitations/sweating but omits advice about separating levothyroxine from atorvastatin.
No follow-up TSH order or timeline for re-evaluation documented.
Uses a structured InstructCommand with SNOMED code, but no other structured sections (e.g., HPI, LabOrder).
Only a single relevant instruction; no redundant or irrelevant data present.
No contradictory or inaccurate statements about medications or dosing.
